programme.title: 4Got10
programme.desc: Brian Barnes (Johnny Messner) wakes up in the desert wounded and with no memory and no idea why hes surrounded by eight bodies, a van with four million in cash and a van full of cocaine. Brian is pursued by not only notorious drug lord Danny Perez (Danny Trejo) who desperately want his money back, and DEA Agent Rooker (Dolph Lundgren), but also a by the corrupt Sheriff Olson (Michael Pare) who will stop at nothing to get his hand on the new found fortune. On the run, Brian discovers the more he remembers the less he wants to know about who he really is.

programme.title: Crossing Point
programme.desc: The girlfriend of a couple vacationing in Baja is kidnapped by a drug dealer who demands that her boyfriend smuggle back cocaine into the US or she will be killed.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: A railroad worker in China in 1941 leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. Uneducated, she relies on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: The Fire Dragon patrol, with their ever-supportive scoutmaster, is headed to Camp Rakhouta for what should be the best week of their lives. But when the "Team Spirit Stick" of the camp goes missing, the entire tradition of the camp is threatened.

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: The War Is Over
programme.desc: Following the bombardment of Kosovo in 1999, the Rahmanis and their three children emigrate to Switzerland. After years of living in their new homeland, the family faces the prospects of deportation. "No one is proud to be a refugee, but when it comes to me, I am not ashamed of who I am" says Rasim - the father of the family and an ex music teacher. Desperate to stay he invents an Albanian Dance Troupe in order to garner signatures of support from the community… The intimate narrative explores the experience of forced migration: the fraught decision to leave; the process of integration and adaptation to a new country; the impact on the family; and always, the yearning for the homeland.

programme.title: Field of Lost Shoes
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Two cop partners, who are also best friends attend a domestic disturbance, only for one to accidentaly critically wound the other. The rest of the police force are suspicious that there may have been no accident.

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: Modigliani
programme.desc: The story of Amedeo Modiglianis bitter rivalry with Pablo Picasso, and his tragic romance with Jeanne Hebuterne.

programme.title: Noble Things
programme.desc: Jimmy Wayne Collins finds himself adrift in Memphis, Tennessee. Forced to return home to the piney woods of Southeast Texas, Jimmy will face his imprisoned brother, his dying father and the demons he left behind.

programme.title: The Last Day of August
programme.desc: Dan (Michael Izquierdo) was paralyzed just over a year ago. Following months of recovery and overwhelmed by lifes new realities, he retreated to a family cabin in upstate New York. On the last day of August, his closest friends arrive unannounced to confront him about his recent reclusive and self-destructive behavior. Wanting to support him, yet skeptical of his psychological health, they attempt the tight-rope walk of loving confrontation in the hopes of convincing Dan to return home. Friendships are tested and love reveals itself in this independent drama about breaking down and breaking through. "The Last Day of August" is about the enduring power of love and friendship, and the struggle to overcome the mental and physical barriers that confront those living with addiction and disability. How we react to tragedy defines us, and when loved ones grapple with immense personal suffering, its not always apparent how to respond and whether the help we have to give is the help thats truly needed. This film is a personal examination of how destructive behaviors such as substance abuse and self-isolation emerge from trauma, and how one finds the strength to overcome.

programme.title: Castle Falls
programme.desc: Rival gangs seek out millions of dollars hidden inside a luxury condominium thats scheduled to be demolished, but first they have to deal with the janitor who found the loot first.

programme.title: Blackmark
programme.desc: In 1963, military industrialist Arthur Blackmark and a Soviet commander must race against the clock to stop an international nuclear incident which threatens to fire up the Cold War and end the world.

programme.title: Its a Perfect Night for Suicide
programme.desc: A comedy about a psychic who pretends to believe that magic exists, a gigolo who pretends to believe the psychic, an illusionist who pretends to be somebody else and a desperate woman who believes she will find true happiness in love... when shes dead. Lenka is a psychic who besides telling fortunes is great at depriving her clients of them, with the help of an extraordinary uncle-illusionist. The business flourishes until Lenkas most profitable client, a soulful Buddhist Yvonne, decides to commit suicide. She was jilted by the man of her dreams - Oscar. Whats more, Yvonne wants to leave a suicidal note, pointing to Lenka as the cause of all her misfortunes. Lenkas entire world falls apart. She must dissuade Yvonne from killing herself and in her desperation is ready to use all her magical skills to make Oscar fall in love with Yvonne. However, Lenka doesnt even suspect shes entering the lions den. A dangerous game begins. The full moon is on the rise - and, surprisingly, the magic starts to work for real. It turns out that the scenario written in the stars is not an easy thing to change...

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: Among Thieves
programme.desc: Three friends - a reporter, an oil analyst and a financial executive - reunite after ten years and accidentally uncover one of the key, hidden reasons for what motivated the war in Iraq. The trio struggles to present evidence to major media that America invaded Iraq to force oil sales from the Euro back to the Dollar to preserve US global monetary supremacy. Against incredible odds, the team must face their pasts, find willing sources to corroborate the story, and survive the conspirators as they push to bring the truth to light.

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: Lucia is an aging Italian actress and director (beautifully portrayed by Antonionis and Fellinis actress Lucia Bosa), decides to come back to the small town where she had spent her happy childhood. She wants to bring the TV where television has never been seen before. She reaches out to the women in the local community with a project that might change their lives forever.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: The spoiled rotten and utterly unlikable rich kid George Amberson becomes horrified when his recently widowed mother rekindles her relationship with the wealthy Eugene Morgan, who she left decades earlier in order to marry Georges father. As George struggles to sabotage his mothers new romance, he must deal with his own romantic feelings for Morgans daughter and the consequences of his meddling as his once great family falls into ruin due to his machinations...

programme.title: Wake
programme.desc: When things get tough for offbeat Carys Reitman, she does what any emotionally isolated, modern girl would do - she goes to strangers funerals. At one fateful funeral, she unexpectedly meets Tyler, a man mourning his fiancee. Despite the warnings of her undertaker best friend Shane and her roommate Lila, she finds herself connecting to someone for the first time. Searching for answers, Carys goes to see her estranged mother to confront her past. And as she tries to open herself to the risks of love with Tyler, she realizes she may have more to fear than just a broken heart.

programme.title: Love Is Not Enough
programme.desc: Samir, must face his parents breakup. While they meet to find the way to tell him, the little Samir surprises them, because he knows perfectly whats happening, putting his own parents into a hard place with his vision of the situation.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss consternation.

programme.title: Dot.Kill
programme.desc: A detective tries to hunt down a serial killer who broadcasts his murders live on the internet.

programme.title: Crossing Point
programme.desc: The girlfriend of a couple vacationing in Baja is kidnapped by a drug dealer who demands that her boyfriend smuggle back cocaine into the US or she will be killed.

programme.title: Maiņas beigas
programme.desc: Losandželosas ielas patruļas policisti Braiens un Maiks ir partneri, kas savā darbā nepazīst mērenību vai ierobežojumus. Viņu pārziņā ir ielas, kurās notiek latīņamerikāņu un melnādaino bandu asa un nežēlīga savstarpēja cīņa. Pāris reizes pāriniekiem paveicas, un viņi izjauc apjomīgus narkotiku un cilvēku tirdzniecības darījumus, tāpēc meksikāņu kartelis pasūta viņu slepkavības.

programme.title: Robokops
programme.desc: 2028. gads Detroitā. Mīlošs vīrs, tēvs un labs policists Alekss Mērfijs, pildot dienesta pienākumus, gūst smagus ievainojumus. Daudznacionālais konglomerāts OmniCorp saskata iespēju iegūt policistu, kas ir daļēji cilvēks, daļēji robots.

programme.title: Sadedzināt pēc izlasīšanas
programme.desc: CIP aģents pēc atlaišanas no darba raksta memuārus. Viņa sieva, kura ierosinājusi laulības šķiršanu, slepus iekopējusi diskā pierakstus un iedevusi advokātei, lai viņa atrastu ko kompromitējošu. Taču advokāte nejauši atstāj disku sporta zāles sieviešu ģērbtuvē, kur darbinieki to atrod. Pieņemot, ka disks satur ārkārtīgi slepenu informāciju, viņi nolemj informāciju pārdot.

programme.title: Pa asmeni skrejošais
programme.desc: Losandželosa, 2019. gads. Riks Dekards ir "pa asmens smaili skrejošais" - policists un atlīdzību mednieks, kura uzdevums ir atrast četrus androīdus-replikantus, kuri nelegāli atgriezās uz Zemes un meklē savu radītāju.

programme.title: Linkolns
programme.desc: ASV Pilsoņu karš tuvojas noslēgumam. Prezidents Ābrams Linkolns ir apņēmies panākt nozīmīga konstitūcijas labojuma pieņemšanu, lai uz visiem laikiem aizliegtu verdzību ASV. Tomēr laika to panākt ir maz, jo kuru katru brīdi karš var beigties. Ja tas notiks pirms labojuma pieņemšanas, dienvidu štati nepieļaus, lai tas iegūst likuma spēku. Izmantojot visus iespējamos līdzekļus, Linkolnam nepakļāvīgajā Kongresā jāiegūst pietiekami daudz balsis, pirms karš beidzas, un visas pūles izrādās veltas.

programme.title: Septiņi psihopāti
programme.desc: Nesekmīgs scenārists netīšām iepinies Losandželosas kriminālajā pasaulē. Tas noticis, kad viņa dīvainie draugi nolaupa gangstera mīļoto šicu.

programme.title: Trusis Džodžo
programme.desc: Neveiklais un vienaudžu atstumtais 10-gadīgais vācu puisēns Džodžo cenšas atrast savu vietu viņam tik neierastajā pasaulē. Lai kompensētu pazudušo tēvu un draugu neesamību, viņš rada sev iedomu draugu - Ādolfu Hitleru, kurš nemaz nav līdzīgs tā laika Trešā reiha vadonim.

programme.desc: Trīsdesmitgadnieki Zoja un Kazims ir bērnības draugi un kaimiņi, un tagad katram no viņiem jāpieņem lēmums, vai sekot savam prātam vai sirdij. Kazims pieņem vecāku padomu un piekrīt sarunātām laulībām Pakistānā ar sievieti, ko nekad nav saticis.

programme.title: Suņu sala

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Food Truck Showdown. Robert competes against three of the best food trucks in North Carolina. The mission is to prepare enough food for 500 people and use beer in every dish.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Outrageous Pumpkins
programme.desc: Pumpkin carving is one of the most fun activities during autumn season. But these individuals take it to the next level, creating real works of art out of their pumpkins. Watch them compete in a series of fun challenges for a great cash prize. They transform the pumpkins into various spooky things, from monsters to zombies and more.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Mango, Pineapple And Pork. Oh My!. Michael Symon heats up the grill for a savoury pork tenderloin marinated in brown sugar, a fruity mango slaw and a thirst-quenching cocktail.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Moms All-American Mac. Michael Symon recreates the Greek-American dishes of his childhood, including his mothers pasta, a crispy salad and a mashup of two desserts.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.desc: Six amateur bakers are invited to join Martha Stewarts Bakeaway Camp, where they will face a selection of challenges to test their skills in the campsite kitchen. programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: News
programme.desc: Новости: a news report from Ukraine with details of the latest national and international stories.

programme.title: Slepkavība
programme.desc: Ceļojot vilcienā uz Ņūdeli, daži labie zēni nokļūst kautiņā ar sliktajiem.

programme.title: Venoms: Būs slaktiņš
programme.desc: Edijs Broks mēģina pielāgoties savai jaunajai dzīvei, esot citplanētiešu simbiota Venoma saimniekam, kas viņam piešķīris pārcilvēciskas spējas, lai viņš būtu nāvējoši modrs. Intervējot sērijveida slepkavu Kletusu Kasadiju, kurš kļūst par simbiota Carnage vadītāju un pēc neveiksmīgas nāvessoda izpildes izbēg no cietuma, Broks mēģina atjaunot savu karjeru.

programme.title: Kurš pēc kārtas?
programme.desc: Pēc kārtējām izjukušajām attiecībām Alija nolemj neielaisties attiecībās ne ar vienu citu, bet gan uzmeklēt savus bijušos, lai noskaidrotu, kurš no tiem ir viņas dzīves īstais vīrietis.

programme.title: Cilvēka dusmas
programme.desc: Jaunais inkasācijas firmas apsargs Patriks uz pārējiem kolēģiem atstāj noslēpumaina un ne pārāk runīga vīra iespaidu. Taču, kad kādas laupīšanas laikā viņš liek lietā savas šāvēja prasmes un vienpersoniski uzveic zagļus, kolēģi aiz pārsteiguma nemitējas spriest - kas šis vīrs īsti ir un no kurienes ieradies. Precīzā šāvēja nolūki drīz nāk gaismā: viņam padomā nokārtot senus rēķinus un viņš nepadosies, līdz nebūs izlīdzinājis svaru kausus.

programme.title: Auniņš Šons filma: Fermagedons
programme.desc: Netālu no auniņa Šona fermas ir avarējis piemīlīgās un draiskās citplanētietes Lu-Las kosmosa kuģis. Lu-Las neparasto spēju, nebeidzamo blēņu un galaktikas mēroga atraugu apburts, Šons nolemj palīdzēt savai jauniegūtajai draudzenei atgriezties mājās, nenojaušot, ka nežēlīga citplanētiešu mednieku organizācija jau dzen viņiem pēdas. Vai Šons un viņa bars spēs novērst Fermagedonu, pirms nav par vēlu?

programme.title: Bēbis boss
programme.desc: Tims Templtons ir savu vecāku uzmanības centrā. Un tā tas ir līdz brīdim, kad viņš satiek savu jauno brālīti – jaundzimušo pieguļošā uzvalkā ar uzņēmēja iemaņām. Abi kašķējas kā jau visi brāļi, izmantojot gan pazemojošas izjokošanas, gan tuvcīņas. Tomēr viņi beidz savas domstarpības, kad bēbis boss atklāj savu ģeniālo plāno, kā iegūt atpakaļ uzmanību, kas veltīta viņu galvenajiem konkurentiem kucēniem. Abi savāc pilsētas mazo bērnu bandu un ar šīs dīvainās komandas palīdzību mēģina izjaukt gaidāmo pasākumu mājdzīvniekiem, lai atgūtu mazuļu likumīgo vietu mīlīguma hierarhijā.

programme.title: Everests
programme.desc: 1996. gada 10. maija rītā divas alpīnistu komandas uzsāk pēdējo posmu ceļā uz Everestu, kas ir pasaules augstākā virsotne. Piepeši kalnu grēdu pārņem negaiss, un piedzīvojumu meklētājiem ceļu aizšķērso cilvēces vēsturē spēcīgākā sniega vētra. Šajos skarbajos apstākļos komandām ir jāiztur stindzinoši brāzmains vējš un mežonīgs aukstums, lai izdzīvotu gandrīz neiespējamā situācijā.

programme.title: Kosmoss manā galvā
programme.desc: Makss, Sofija un Gass no Kosmosa Aizsardzības spēkiem un viņu mikroskopiskais kosmosa kuģis kāda negadījuma laikā nonācis 16 gadus vecā Normana smadzenēs. Nanoizmēra citplanētiešiem jāpierunā Normans viņiem palīdzēt glābt zemi no ļaunā starpgalaktiku nelieša Zoltarda, kurš pāņēmis savā varā skolas direktori. Normanam kopā ar draugiem jācenšas noslēpt citplanētiešu klātbūtne skolā, vienlaikus turpinot galaktisko cīņu starp labo un ļauno.

programme.title: Kā Grinčs nozaga Ziemassvētkus
programme.desc: Vūvila ir maza, brīnumaina pilsētiņa, kas atrodas sniegpārsliņā. Visiem Vūvivas iedzīvotājiem ļoti patīk Ziemassvētki. Taču pilsētiņas tuvumā mīt Grinčs — ļoti nejauks radījums, kuram riebjas gan Ziemassvētki, gan arī vūvilieši, jo tie savulaik viņu izstūmuši no sava vidus. Redzot, kā viņi priecājas un gaida svētkus, Grinčs nolemj nozagt visas Ziemassvētku dāvanas. Bet varbūt kādai mazai meitenītei izdosies sadraudzēties ar Grinču un likt viņam mainīt savus plānus?

programme.title: Mednieks un ledus karaliene
programme.desc: Ļaunā Ravenna uzzina, ka viņas māsa karaliene Freija gaida mazuli un mīl kādu augstmani. Freija dzemdē meitenīti, bet viņas mīļākais nogalina mazuli un Freijas dusmas atbrīvo ledus spēku, kas nogalina mīļāko. Freija dodas uz ziemeļiem, lai uzbūvētu pili un izveidotu armiju, kura nozog bērnus un izaudzina tos par nežēlīgiem kareivjiem. Paiet gadi, un Ēriks un Sāra ir izauguši un iemīlējušies viens otrā. Viņi plāno aizbēgt no pils, bet Freija starp viņiem uzbūvē ledus sienu. Kādu dienu Sniegbaltīte saslimst, un viņas vīrs meklē Ēriku, lai pateiktu, ka burvju spogulis ir nozagts, kad tika vests uz patvērumu. Ēriks apvienojas ar diviem rūķīšiem, lai atrastu spoguli, taču viņu meklējumi ir saistīti ar briesmām.

programme.title: Karalis Artūrs
programme.desc: Artūrs nevēlas kļūt par vadoni. Viņa vienīgā vēlme ir atstāt Lielbritāniju un atgriezties Romas mierīgajā un līdzsvarotajā dzīvē. Taču pirms tam viņam kopā ar Apaļā galda bruņiniekiem jādodas pēdējā uzdevumā. Top skaidrs, ka pēc Romas sairšanas Lielbritānijai vajadzēs karali, kas ne tikai aizsargās valsti pret nemitīgajiem sakšu iebrukumiem, bet arī iedibinās uz salas jaunu kārtību. Ar Merlina un daiļās, drosmīgās Ginevras atbalstu Artūram būs sevī jārod spēks, lai mainītu vēstures gaitu.

programme.title: Sātans "Pradas" brunčos
programme.desc: Žilbinošajā Ņujorkas modes pasaulē žurnāls "Runway" ir tikpat kā Svētā Grāla statusā. To ar manikirētu dūri vada Miranda Prīstlija – ietekmīgākā sieviete modes nozarē. "Runway" ir biedinošs izaicinājums jebkuram, kas vēlas gūt panākumus šai jomā. Lai padarītu "Runway" par Ņujorkas un tātad arī visas pasaules modes bībeli, Miranda nekam neļauj stāties sev ceļā – ieskaitot neskaitāmas asistentes, kas atlaistas, jo nav atbildušas neaptveramajām prasībām. Neviens sevi cienošs cilvēks nespētu paciest šādu darbu, tomēr miljoniem jaunu sieviešu šādas izdevības dēļ būtu gatavas uz visu.

programme.title: Kina un Juks: Polārlapsu piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Divu lapsu piedzīvojums laikā, kad tās gatavojas pirmo reizi kļūt par vecākiem un globālā sasilšana maina likumus visiem – gan dabai, gan dzīvniekiem,

programme.title: Ragana
programme.desc: Ir 17. gs. 30. gadi Jaunanglijā. Viljamam (Ralfs Ainsons) un viņa ģimenei draud izraidīšana no ciemata, jo radies strīds ar baznīcu par Jauno Derību, tādēļ ģimene nolemj pamest ciematu. Galu galā viņi apmetas fermā savāda meža malā. Kad iet bojā iesētais, ģimene viens otru tur aizdomās paranojas iespaidā un ģimenes aizdomas vēršas pret meitu Tomasinu (Anja Tailore-Džoja). Ģimenes un fermas locekļiem liecoties zem savu aizdomu smaguma, Tomasinu sāk apsūdzēt raganu burvestībās.

programme.title: Kur vēži dzied
programme.desc: Dēlijas Ouensas sensacionālā romāna ekranizācija vēsta par Kiju – pamestu meiteni, kura pieaugusi viena pati bīstamajā Ziemeļkarolīnas dumbrājā. Gadiem ilgi tuvējā pilsētiņā Bārklijkovā klīst baumas par "purva skuķi", kas nošķir Kiju no sabiedrības. Kad viņa piesaista divu vietējo puišu uzmanību, Kija atver sirdi jaunai un pārsteidzošai pasaulei, bet, kad viens no puišiem iet bojā, visu aizdomas nekavējoties krīt uz purva vientuļnieci.

programme.title: Ārpus kartes
programme.desc: Asa sižeta piedzīvojumu filma, kas veidota pēc populāras video spēļu sērijas, aizved mūs uz visdažādākajiem pasaules nostūriem, sekojot Neitam un Sallijam, kad viņi dodas bīstamā ceļā pēc "dižākajiem, nekad neatrastajiem dārgumiem", vienlaikus meklēdami Neita sen pazudušo brāli.

programme.title: Palaidnis
programme.desc: Kopš kucēna vecuma Palaidnis ir lutināts un dzīvojis greznībā plašā savrupnamā. Taču, kad viņa turīgā saimniece dodas mūžībā, Palaidnis paliek viens un nonāk uz ielas. Siltumnīcas apstākļos augušais suns ir galīgi nepiemērots dzīvei reālajā pasaulē, un, it kā ar to būtu par maz, viņu sāk vajāt saimnieces alkatīgie radinieki, kas ar Palaidņa starpniecību cer tikt pie iespaidīga mantojuma.

programme.title: Teorija par visu
programme.desc: 20. gadsimta 60. gados Kembridžas Universitātes students un topošais fiziķis Stīvens Hokings iemīlas savā studiju biedrē Džeinā Vaildā. Kad Hokingam ir 21 gads, viņam konstatē motorā neirona slimību. Par spīti tam un ar Džeinas palīdzību viņš uzsāk ambiciozu laika izpētes projektu, lai gan puiša ārsts apgalvo, ka laika viņam ir atlicis ļoti maz. Spītējot nelaimei, Stīvens un Džeina izdara jaunus atklājumus medicīnā un zinātnē, sasniedzot vairāk, nekā abi bija spējuši iedomāties.

programme.title: Zirnekļcilvēks: Mājupceļa nav
programme.desc: Pirmo reizi Zirnekļcilvēka filmu sērijas vēsturē mūsu draudzīgā apkaimes varoņa maska ir noņemta un viņš vairs nespēj nošķirt savu parasto dzīvi no riskantajām supervaroņa gaitām. Kad viņš lūdz palīdzību Doktoram Streindžam, likmes kļūst vēl augstākas, liekot viņam aptvert, ko patiesībā nozīmē būt Zirnekļcilvēkam.

programme.title: Tuksneša prinči
programme.desc: Berberu puisēna un viņa drauga kamieļa piedzīvojumi, šķērsojot tuksnesi.

programme.title: Troļļi
programme.desc: Troļļi ir mazi un laimīgi radījumi, kuri savā pasaulē nodarbojas ar dziedāšanu, apskaušanos un būšanu laimīgiem. Tomēr viņu idilli mežā pārtrauc bergeni, kuri atklāj viņu atrašanās vietu un kuri ir milzu monstri, kas ir nepārtraukti nelaimīgi. Monstri atklāj, ka viņi var kļūt laimīgi, ja apēd troļļus. Troļļi glābjas, un viņus caur slepeniem tuneļiem vada karalis Pepijs. Pēc divām desmitgadēm Pepija meita Popija organizē izsmalcinātas svinības par godu tam, ka viņi ir izglābušies. Vientulīgais izdzīvošanas speciālists Zars pret to iebilst, jo uztraucas, ka troksnis varētu piesaistīt bergenus. Viņam izrādās taisnība, un bergeni nolaupa daudzus troļļus. Popija dodas glābšanas misijā, un Zars dodas viņai līdzi, jo neuzskata, ka Popija būs drošībā. Viņi ierodas bergenu pilsētā, kur ierauga, kā bergenu karalis apēd vienu trolli. Tomēr Popijas domas ir tādas, ka šis trollis tomēr ir izdzīvojis. Viņi atklāj, kur troļļus tur gūstā un kas tos uzrauga. To uzraudzītāja ir virtuves darbiniece Bridžita, kuru ir apbūris karalis. Viņa piekrīt atbrīvot ieslodzītos un ļaut Popijai un Zaram piekļūt karalim, ja viņai būs iespēja ar karali aiziet uz randiņu. Gatavojoties randiņam, Popija un Zars sastrīdas, jo Zars atsakās dziedāt, apgalvojot, ka dziedāšana nogalināja viņa vecmāmiņu, un šis notikums padarīja viņu pelēku. Bridžita tiek sapucēta kā lēdija, un viņa kopā ar karali dodas braukt ar skrituļslidām un uz restorānu. Troļļi tomēr nespēj Bridžitu pārvērst lēdijā uz visiem laikiem, un Bridžita sāk raudāt. Viņi mēģina izglābt troļļus, taču glābšanas laikā arī Popija tiek ieslodzīta. Popijai zūd cerības, un visi troļļi paliek pelēki. Zars sāk dziedāt un atzīstas mīlestībā. Visiem par pārsteigumu, troļļiem atgriežas krāsas, arī Zaram. Troļļus taisās apēst, bet Bridžita viņus izglābj. Karalis un citi bergeni atklāj, ka viņiem troļļi nav jāapēd, lai kļūtu laimīgi. Troļļi un bergeni laimīgi sāk dzīvot saticīgi, un Popiju kronē par troļļu karalieni.

programme.title: Izvēle
programme.desc: Mīlestība? Atbildība? Nopietnas attiecības, ģimene? Iesīkstējušais vecpuisis Treviss Pārkers uzskata, ka tas viss nav viņam. Viņam ir labs darbs un uzticami draugi. Viņš aizraujas ar medībām, makšķerēšanu un ekstrēmiem sporta veidiem un izvairās no nopietnām attiecībām. Tomēr nav vēl dzimis cilvēks, kam būtu izdevies izvairīties no mīlestības….

programme.title: Dziedi!
programme.desc: Kad viņa teātrim draud slēgšana, uzņēmējdarbībā pieredzējušais koala Basters Mūns (Metjū Makkonahijs) sarīko dziesmu konkursu. Daudziem vietējiem zvēriem tas rada iespēju izpausties. Cūka Rosita (Rīza Viterspūna) ir māte un mājsaimniece, kura atteicās no pusaudža sapņa kļūt par dziedātāju. Pusaudze dzeloņcūka Eša (Skārleta Johansone) ir pancīga roķere alternatīvās mūzikas grupā. Gorillu Džoniju (Tārons Edžertons) viņa tēvs (Pīters Serafinovičs) grib pārliecināt pievērsties savam banku aplaupītāja arodam. Ikkatrs no šiem radījumiem vēlas piepildīt savu sapni un dziedāt no visas sirds!

programme.title: Džumandži: Laipni lūgti džungļos
programme.desc: Četri vidusskolēni atrod vecu spēļu konsoli ar līdz šim neredzētu videospēli džumandži. Viņi iesaistās šajā spēlē, kas norisinās džungļos, un iemiesojas pašu izraudzītajos avataros. Jaunieši apjauš, ka džumandži ir kas vairāk par spēli, tā ir cīņa par izdzīvošanu. Lai uzvarētu spēlē, viņiem jādodas bīstamākajā piedzīvojumā mūžā, jāatklāj Alana Periša pirms 20 gadiem atstātās pēdas un jāmaina priekšstats pašiem par sevi, pretējā gadījumā viņi paliks ieslēgti spēlē uz visiem laikiem...

programme.title: Ķēķis
programme.desc: Pusdienu steigas laikā Manhatanas restorānā "The Grill" no kases ir pazudusi nauda. Visi virtuvē strādājošie pavāri bez dokumentiem tiek pratināti, un lielākās aizdomas krīt uz Pedro. Viņš ir sapņotājs, kas allaž pamanās iekulties nepatikšanās, un ir iemīlējies Džūlijā, amerikāņu viesmīlē, kura nevēlas ielaisties nopietnās attiecībās ar viņu. Restorāna īpašnieks Rašīds ir solījis Pedro palīdzēt sakārtot dokumentus, lai viņš varētu kļūt par "legālu" darbinieku. Taču šokējošs atklājums par Džūliju pamudina Pedro uz rīcību, kas uz visiem laikiem var apturēt darbību vienā no pilsētas noslogotākajām virtuvēm.

programme.title: Greja piecdesmit nokrāsas
programme.desc: Koledžas studente Anastasija Stīla savas saslimušās istabas biedrenes vietā dodas intervēt slaveno uzņēmēju Kristianu Greju universitātes avīzei, taču meitene nenojauš, kā mainīsies viņas dzīve. Noslēpumainajam, bagātajam un ietekmīgajam Kristianam iepatīkas Ana. Lai gan meitenes seksuālā pieredze ir visai niecīga, viņa ļaujas šai dēkai un uzzina, ka Kristiana seksuālās tieksmes pārkāpj sāpju un baudas robežas.

programme.title: Draiskule
programme.desc: Kopš bērnības Eimijas brunčumednieks tēvs ir pārliecinājis viņu, ka monogāmija nav iespējama. Tagad Eimija strādā žurnāla redakcijā un dzīvo ar šādu pārliecību, baudot dzīvi, kas ir brīva no smacējošām, garlaicīgām romantiskajām saistībām, tomēr patiesībā viņa ir iegrimusi rutīnā. Reiz Eimija secina, ka sāk iemīlēties sava jaunā raksta varonī – apburošajā un veiksmīgajā sporta ārstā Āronā Konersā. Tas liek sievietei prātot, vai citi pieaugušie, tostarp šis puisis, kuram ir patiesas simpātijas pret Eimiju, varētu pārliecināt viņu mainīt dzīves filozofiju.

programme.title: LaLiga. Villarreal - Athletic Club
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Basketbols: WNBA. Izslēgšanas spēles. 1/2 fināls. 3. spēle
programme.desc: Get the best moments of the Womens National Basketball Association, a professional basketball league in the United States. It currently is composed of twelve teams. The regular season is played from May to September, the All Star game is played midway through the season in July and the WNBA Finals at the end of September until the beginning of October.

UFC. Carlos Ulberg-Dominick Reyes
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Real Betis - Osasuna
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. programme.title: First Home Fix
programme.desc: Raisa and Austin renovate a Cliff May home to fit a couples modern lifestyle, and the historic house presents plenty of budget challenges.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: In this home improvement show, watch Ben and Erin Napier renovate old dulling houses in Mississippi, USA to dream homes. The pair are hoping to share their love of the small, historic homes of the town, and also transfer the enthusiasm of renovating a place to other home buyers. But can issues arise with the home replenishments. Since all the houses are extremely old, Ben and Erin do face problems ensuring the house dont get damaged when they work on them, and also that they can keep up with their original up to scratch plans. All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Brother vs. Brother
programme.desc: Property experts Johnathan and Drew Scott compete to complete their renovation projects. Alongside a chosen team of experts, the pair are given a budget of $500,000 and an equal timeline to complete their home renovations. In each episode the teams revamp a different property, which are then judged and valued by an appraiser and real estate expert to assess which property has seen a larger increase in value. The worst performing team member is eliminated from the show after each project, with the last team member standing taking home a $50,000 prize.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: The Kalamas tackle a renovation of Kamohais childhood home for his parents, and theyre the toughest design clients the duo has ever had.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: Jenn helps a family that needs more space. She turns their 1960s home from cramped and cluttered to open and airy with an organic, modern design.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Chasing the West
programme.desc: Two Texas business owners turn to the brothers to find a large home. Plus, a Hollywood couple realise country living isnt for the faint of heart.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: In this home improvement show, watch Ben and Erin Napier renovate old dulling houses in Mississippi, USA to dream homes. The pair are hoping to share their love of the small, historic homes of the town, and also transfer the enthusiasm of renovating a place to other home buyers. But can issues arise with the home replenishments. Since all the houses are extremely old, Ben and Erin do face problems ensuring the house dont get damaged when they work on them, and also that they can keep up with their original up to scratch plans. All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. programme.title: The UnXplained: Mysteries of the Universe
programme.desc: We humans want to boldly go into uncharted territories to make new discoveries. As the next era of space exploration begins, what will we find when we reach other planets? What dangers will we face when we try to conquer these new frontiers?

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are hoping to strike it rich in the Mill City, Minneapolis, Minnesota. While there, the guys have a brush with a happy little Bob Ross painting, tackle a jersey signed by the Minnesota Vikings Purple People Eaters.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are fishin for big deals in the Sunshine State! Between beach days and dinner with WWE superstar Titus ONeil, the gang is casting a wide net in St. Petersburg, Florida.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: In an all-UFO special, Tony Harris breaks down the latest developments and most compelling photographic evidence in a tumultuous year of UFO revelations. Did the most recent UAP incidents present a threat to national security?

programme.title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: The Academy Award-winning actor explores the stories of some of the most famous jailbreaks in history, from notorious places like Alcatraz, Dannemora and Pittsburgh State Penitentiary. Freeman, who once played the character of prisoner Red in the legendary Shawshank Redemption, investigates these incredible real-life escapes using cutting-edge technology to recreate them. Join him to discover the untold stories behind these daring jailbreaks, through firsthand accounts from prisoners, their cellmates, families and prison employees.

Join him to discover the untold stories behind these daring jailbreaks, through firsthand accounts from prisoners, their cellmates, families and prison employees.

programme.title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: The Academy Award-winning actor explores the stories of some of the most famous jailbreaks in history, from notorious places like Alcatraz, Dannemora and Pittsburgh State Penitentiary. Freeman, who once played the character of prisoner Red in the legendary Shawshank Redemption, investigates these incredible real-life escapes using cutting-edge technology to recreate them. Join him to discover the untold stories behind these daring jailbreaks, through firsthand accounts from prisoners, their cellmates, families and prison employees.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Andy and Paul return to a Colorado cattle ranch that has had 16 mutilations over the last 25 years and features a mysterious bridge that may contain a dimensional portal, uncovering shocking scientific evidence that ties directly to Skinwalker Ranch.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum head to the heart of the Bluegrass State. In Lexington, Kentucky, the team brings a 41 Ford Coupe Deluxe roaring back to life, and legendary Coach John Calipari assists with a University of Kentucky basketball collection.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are making some revolutionary deals in Boston, Massachusetts. The guys have a wicked awesome visit as they check out a Patriotic painting, try their hand at rowing, and take aim at a Brown Bess musket from the 1700s.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: This is the most mysterious of the Dead Sea Scrolls. An ancient treasure map, recorded on a rare Copper Scroll, could lead to billions of dollars of buried treasure in gold, in silver, in jewels. Where is the secret treasure of the Copper Scroll?

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: The Tower of Babel, Sodom and Gomorrah, Mount Sinai are some of the greatest Old Testament stories ever told. Yet these iconic places have seemingly vanished from the map. Where are the Old Testaments lost places--and what might they reveal?

programme.title: Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan
programme.desc: An armoured-car depot employee uses his insider knowledge to plan a heist that could net him, and the longtime friends he recruits, more than $18 million in cash.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum rise from the ashes and start anew in Phoenix, Arizona. Along the way, Rick check out rare vintage Americana items, Chum checks out a mid-century furniture collection, and Corey gets in the ring for some boxing memorabilia.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: This is the most mysterious of the Dead Sea Scrolls. An ancient treasure map, recorded on a rare Copper Scroll, could lead to billions of dollars of buried treasure in gold, in silver, in jewels. Where is the secret treasure of the Copper Scroll?

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: The Tower of Babel, Sodom and Gomorrah, Mount Sinai are some of the greatest Old Testament stories ever told. Yet these iconic places have seemingly vanished from the map. Where are the Old Testaments lost places--and what might they reveal?

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: "Missing in Alaska" investigates the region of northwest Alaska, where over 20,000 people have vanished in an area locals call the Alaska Triangle. In all these cases, the bodies are rarely discovered. Who or whats behind these cases is unknown.

programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend of the Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Reality show that follows a group of modern day treasure hunters who search for the Lost Dutchman mine in the Superstition mountain range of Arizona. The promise of a $200 million has lured thousands of treasure hunters for years. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong seeker Wayne Tuttle is breaking tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. They will encounter many real life dangers on their adventure, leaving you on the edge of your seats in each episode.

programme.title: How the Earth Was Made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: In Search Of Aliens is an American TV series following Giorgio Tsoukalos, a writer, ufologist, television presenter and producer. He is a proponent of the pseudoarchaeological theory that ancient alien astronauts interacted with ancient humans. He takes the viewers on a paranormal journey, suggesting that aliens made contact with primitive humans long time ago and there is such evidence as Indian Sanskrit texts, describing flying machines called Vimanas; Jewish Zohar writings describing a "manna machine" similar to chlorella algae processing of today and many more. He explores the fascinating evidence behind the Earths most famous mysteries.

programme.title: The Tesla Files
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates mysteries surrounding the work of inventor Nikola Tesla, one of the most important and eccentric scientists in history. In the late 19th and early 20th century, Nikola Tesla invented alternating current, developed radio and cell phone technology, conceived of wireless electricity, remote control and electric cars, and devised a mega-weapon more deadly than the atomic bomb. Researcher Marc Seifer, astrophysicist Travis Taylor, and investigative journalist Jason Stapleton try to unravel the mystery of Teslas missing files, which were confiscated by the US government after he died in 1943. Did they contain his plans for free worldwide electricity? Or his designs for a death ray? Tune in and find out!

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: In Search Of Aliens is an American TV series following Giorgio Tsoukalos, a writer, ufologist, television presenter and producer. He is a proponent of the pseudoarchaeological theory that ancient alien astronauts interacted with ancient humans. He explores the fascinating evidence behind the Earths most famous mysteries.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: Rome: Rise and Fall of an Empire
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. The Romans are regarded as one of the most revolutionary Empires in the entire course of history and a substantial amount of theories, principles and engineering techniques they experimented with are still applied to this day. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: Ancient Top
programme.desc: Ancient Top 10 presents the most fascinating inventions, creations, events and historical figures of the ancient world. Take a journey back in time and discover some of the most amazing facts about ancient civilizations in this entertaining countdown television series, to find out things you never knew about Greeks, Egyptians, Romans and more. Combining CGI and archival footage, the show ranks different things in every episode, from greatest monuments and ships and cities and dictators and much more.

programme.title: UFO Files
programme.desc: In the search for life beyond our planet, this documentary investigates areas on earth that are said to have had UFO activity, conspiracy theories and phenomenons. Interviewing a variety of scientists and experts on UFOs and examining when possible evidence can prove or suggest anything towards super natural life. From going off of tales that have been told and spread through generations and or cultures to personal experiences where sighting have occurred the series covers the super natural phenomenon that is life beyond earth.

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: Primate sightings in the Alaskan woods have the team puzzled, since experts say that monkeys have never lived in Alaska. The team investigates whether there could be a variety in the Alaska Triangle that is making meals out of men.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Japan, 1612: Legendary samurai Musashi meets arch rival Kojiro in a climactic duel. Modern-day warrior SFC Terry Schappert goes inside some of the most famous warrior cultures of all time to explore their weaponry, tactics and psyche.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: Nothing beats the taste of a Southern fried meal and Bobby traces its amazing journey to your plate. In Alabama, Bobby wades among 275,000 catfish during feeding time, and discovers how each fish scooped from the pond becomes a fillet within an hour.

The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: Ancient Top
programme.desc: Ancient Top 10 presents the most fascinating inventions, creations, events and historical figures of the ancient world. Take a journey back in time and discover some of the most amazing facts about ancient civilizations in this entertaining countdown television series, to find out things you never knew about Greeks, Egyptians, Romans and more. Combining CGI and archival footage, the show ranks different things in every episode, from greatest monuments and ships and cities and dictators and much more.

programme.title: UFO Files
programme.desc: In the search for life beyond our planet, this documentary investigates areas on earth that are said to have had UFO activity, conspiracy theories and phenomenons. Interviewing a variety of scientists and experts on UFOs and examining when possible evidence can prove or suggest anything towards super natural life. From going off of tales that have been told and spread through generations and or cultures to personal experiences where sighting have occurred the series covers the super natural phenomenon that is life beyond earth.

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: Primate sightings in the Alaskan woods have the team puzzled, since experts say that monkeys have never lived in Alaska. The team investigates whether there could be a variety in the Alaska Triangle that is making meals out of men.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Japan, 1612: Legendary samurai Musashi meets arch rival Kojiro in a climactic duel. Modern-day warrior SFC Terry Schappert goes inside some of the most famous warrior cultures of all time to explore their weaponry, tactics and psyche.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: Nothing beats the taste of a Southern fried meal and Bobby traces its amazing journey to your plate. In Alabama, Bobby wades among 275,000 catfish during feeding time, and discovers how each fish scooped from the pond becomes a fillet within an hour.

programme.title: How the Earth Was Made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Join Don Wildman as he uncovers an ancient escape route and the birthplace of Jesus. He sets out to find the truth behind Jerusalems most mysterious and enduring prophecies, the people who foretold them and what was left underground.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Recreated with stunning technology, we reveal these violent conflicts like never before, examining the soldiers, strategies and weapons deployed by the powerful legions. From Hannibals clashes with Rome to Alexander the Greats pursuits throughout India, these conflicts have had a resounding impact on our history and with these reconstructions you will see the ferocious aspects of war in antiquity.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Some of Americas most important historical and cultural treasures have been lost or stolen from famous museums, government archives and private collections. Host Brad Meltzer sets out to find a number of these precious artifacts, such as George Washingtons teeth, Apollo 11 moon landing tapes, ground zero flag from the September 11 attacks, Hitlers personal photo albums, and more. Brad is also soliciting tips from the audience, and offering a money reward.

programme.title: Lost Relics of the Knights Templar
programme.desc: Lost Relics of the Knights Templar follows the exploits of treasure hunters Hamilton White and his long-time friend, Carl Cookson, as they search for the treasure hoard reputed to have belonged to the legendary Knights Templar. The mysterious Knights were the equivalent of todays special forces and were the most skilled fighters in the ranks of the Crusaders. However, up until the present day, no major item belonging to the Knights has ever been discovered. But Hamilton and Carl believe that they have now found a treasure trove that reveals who the Knights were, how they practised their beliefs, and why they were hunted, imprisoned and disbanded by Papal decree in 1307. Experts offer their analysis and opinion to clarify the history.
