programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The show that combines cold hard science with some of the craziest, most spectacular and painful user generated clips ever recorded is back for a third season. Richard Hammond introduces a host of new mishaps featuring brave, if misguided individuals from around the world and then explains the science behind their failure and humiliation with the use of bespoke animations and super slo-mo cinematography. Each week we show between 50 and 60 clips of misadventure - ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes. Each episode will feature several themes such as motorbike drifting, wakeboarding or attempting to fly drones. Clips are paused, re-wound, and re-played as we analyse exactly what went wrong and why. Richard Hammond explains the physics, chemistry and biology at play, by presenting forensic detail to explain the stupidity that resulted in failure. Hell study everything from acceleration to aero dynamics, fluid pressure to combustion and human anatomy to flammability. This is misadventure explained. This is The Science of Stupid.

programme.title: Mars: One Day on the Red Planet
programme.desc: An epic journey revealing the real Mars, as youve never seen it before. Using data from orbiters and rovers to build accurate views of the red planet and uncover its secrets. On a single circuit of Mars from dawn to dusk, encounter monster volcanos, ancient lakes, alien ice-worlds and spacecraft crash sites. Explore humanitys Martian obsession, join the relentless search for life there, and hunt for a human home on the red planets surface.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: A container ship strikes the Francis Scott Key Bridge, causing it to collapse and paralyze the Port of Baltimore. Other fails include a roof collapse at a Dutch soccer stadium, a crane fire 45 floors over Manhattan, two Scottish towers that fail to fall in a controlled demolition, and a sewer pressure test in China that sends a "poonami" into the sky. Its enough to turn one to drink … at the Crooked House, Englands wonkiest pub.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: In Turkey, buildings claiming to be earthquake-proof end up falling down. Two gantry cranes bump into each other on a harbor in Taiwan; and a battery factory blows up in South Korea, resulting in a bad day at the office. Knob and tube wiring might be obsolete, but the Sydney Opera House is going strong, despite its many initial design flaws. The city of Dresden wishes they could reverse engineer the collapse of the Carola Bridge.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Ancient China from Above
programme.desc: China is a land of immense scale and diversity, an ancient civilization with a history dating back thousands of years. How have the traditions of China shaped its landscape and people, and how do they hold up in the present day? To capture its scale and complexity we embark on an epic aerial journey across Chinas varied landscapes and cultures to uncover how these practices and icons endure. From the monumental engineering feats of the Great Wall to a massive water splashing festival in the tropical south, we unveil the secrets and patterns of Chinas living past in a fresh new perspective.

programme.title: Ancient China from Above
programme.desc: Dr Allan Maca explores a newly discovered ancient megacity that 4000 years ago was one of the biggest on the planet. Its people created amazing Maya-like carvings like nothing ever found in China before. Theres also grizzly evidence of human sacrifice on an unprecedented scale. This lost civilisation changes everything we thought we knew about the origins of China, but why, after 500 years, did they vanish? Allan and his team investigate ancient cataclysms to try to solve this great mystery.

programme.title: Ancient China from Above
programme.desc: In episode two, we take to the air to reveal how modern China lives,eats,works,travels andplays on a mega scale. We will learn how this nation has transformed its cities and infrastructure in three decades while still retaining its traditions. We gain a greater understanding of how Chinas industrialization impacts the planet in negative ways, and how they are seeking solutions. And we find out what a billion plus population does for fun and how it crosses the countrys huge expanses.

programme.title: Genghis Khan: The Secret History of the Mongols
programme.desc: After taking the title of khan, Chinggis consolidated power by building a formidable army and eliminating rivals like the shaman Teb Tengri. Chinggis began his conquests with bold campaigns against the Tanguts and the Jin Empires, where brutal sieges of the city involved bold new military maneuvers, expanding the Mongol Empire to unprecedented heights.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. programme.title: Tuts Treasures: Hidden Secrets
programme.desc: Howard Carters discovery of Tutankhamuns tomb in 1922 made headlines across the world sparking a global frenzy for Ancient Egypt. But over the decades since the find, many of the pharaohs priceless grave goods have disappeared into museum basements and archives across Egypt. Now all 5,398 objects are being reunited for the first time since their discovery at the new Grand Egyptian Museum. Many have never been seen before but together they shed new light on the short, eventful life of the so-called "Boy King" and are now helping experts realise the sheer scale of Tutankhamuns influence in the ancient world.

programme.title: Egypts Treasure Guardians
programme.desc: Egypt is home to many of the most famous archaeological treasures on Earth. But over the last five years, Egypt has suffered a tumultuous revolution and tourist numbers have plummeted. This programme follows a select cast of individuals, determined to bring Egypt back from the brink: to discover more of Egypts history, to keep its heritage safe and to get tourists to visit the country again. Dr John Ward and Dr Maria Nilsson are a young charismatic couple who return year after year to a site in the south of the country, Gebel el Silsila. Dr Tarek Tawfik is a professor of archaeology tasked with running the biggest building project on the Giza plateau since the pyramids themselves: the Grand Egyptian Museum. Nora Shawki is a 26 year old PhD student exploring her first dig site in the Nile Delta, and Eddy Cannaerts is one of 5000 contractors working on the Grand Egyptian Museum, desperate to keep his build schedule on track. Together they are all hoping to get Egypt back on track, and bring the tourists back.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the Curse of the Afterlife. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Cleopatras Final Secret
programme.desc: Archaeologist Kathleen Martinez is leading a thrilling detective hunt on land and underwater, to unearth the final pieces of the puzzle that will unlock the story of Cleopatras last days. Armed with the latest technology and the unparalleled skills of explorer Bob Ballard, she is guaranteed to make extraordinary discoveries. This could be the find of the century: Cleopatras Lost Tomb.

programme.title: Genghis Khan: The Secret History of the Mongols
programme.desc: After taking the title of khan, Chinggis consolidated power by building a formidable army and eliminating rivals like the shaman Teb Tengri. Chinggis began his conquests with bold campaigns against the Tanguts and the Jin Empires, where brutal sieges of the city involved bold new military maneuvers, expanding the Mongol Empire to unprecedented heights.

programme.title: Genghis Khan: The Secret History of the Mongols
programme.desc: When a neighboring empire attacks a Mongol caravan, Chinggis Khan unleashes a devastating campaign that annihilates the empire and solidifies Mongol dominance across the lands of Persia. As his health declines, he names his son Ogedei as his successor and leads one final campaign against the neighboring Tanguts before his death, leaving behind an empire that spans continents.

programme.title: Lost in the Jungle
programme.desc: A deadly plane crash deep in the Colombian rainforest strands four young siblings to survive 40 unimaginable days alone. For the first time, the children tell their story, revealing their epic fight to stay alive as a dramatic rescue mission unfolds around them, uniting Indigenous trackers and the military in a race against time in this gripping true story of survival, courage and hope.

programme.title: Genghis Khan: The Secret History of the Mongols
programme.desc: When a neighboring empire attacks a Mongol caravan, Chinggis Khan unleashes a devastating campaign that annihilates the empire and solidifies Mongol dominance across the lands of Persia. As his health declines, he names his son Ogedei as his successor and leads one final campaign against the neighboring Tanguts before his death, leaving behind an empire that spans continents.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: A container ship strikes the Francis Scott Key Bridge, causing it to collapse and paralyze the Port of Baltimore. Other fails include a roof collapse at a Dutch soccer stadium, a crane fire 45 floors over Manhattan, two Scottish towers that fail to fall in a controlled demolition, and a sewer pressure test in China that sends a "poonami" into the sky. Its enough to turn one to drink … at the Crooked House, Englands wonkiest pub.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: In Turkey, buildings claiming to be earthquake-proof end up falling down. Two gantry cranes bump into each other on a harbor in Taiwan; and a battery factory blows up in South Korea, resulting in a bad day at the office. Knob and tube wiring might be obsolete, but the Sydney Opera House is going strong, despite its many initial design flaws. The city of Dresden wishes they could reverse engineer the collapse of the Carola Bridge.

programme.title: Hubbles Cosmic Journey
programme.desc: Hubble was launched in April 1990 onboard Space Shuttle Discoveryh and marked one of humanitys biggest dreams; to place a telescope into space.

programme.title: Dark Secrets of the Sun
programme.desc: It contains 99.9 percent of all the matter in our solar system and sheds hot plasma at nearly a million miles an hour. The temperature at its core is a staggering 27 million degrees Fahrenheit. It convulses, it blazes, it sings. You know it as the sun. Scientists know it as one of the most amazing physics laboratories in the universe. Now, with the help of new spacecraft and Earth-based telescopes, scientists are seeing the sun as they never have before and even recreating what happens at its very center in labs here on Earth. Their work will help us understand aspects of the sun that have puzzled scientists for decades. But more critically, it may help us predict and track solar storms that have the power to zap our power grid, shut down telecommunications, and ground global air travel for days, weeks, or even longer. Such storms have happened before-but never in the modern era of satellite communication. "Dark Secrets of the Sun" reveals a bright new dawn in our understanding of our nearest star-one that might help keep our planet from going dark.

programme.title: Indias Wild Leopards
programme.desc: Follow wildlife cameraman Sandesh Kadur into some of Indias most challenging and isolated regions on his mission to discover the secretive lives of Indias Secret Leopards.

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: A number of surprising, over-the-top, fierce moments, and life or death situations from the animal kingdom - dangerous rescues, insane acts of bravery, shocking battles, and much more. Tune in and see what happens when animals go wild.

programme.title: Americas Wild Spaces
programme.desc: This show explores the unbridled natural beauty of Americas national parks and highlights some of the most awe-inspiring scenery on the planet. Travelling beyond the more conventional tourist hot-spots, the viewer is transported to the hidden wonders of Americas wild spaces. Episodes include joining a scientific exploration of the 277 mile long Grand Canyon, studying its geological history, exploring the microscopic colonies of vegetation and examining its unique creatures; journeying through the Everglades, a 1.5 million acre home to strange creatures, carnivorous plants, amphibious birds and fish that can breathe air; and navigating across the northwest archipelago of Hawaii following a team of diving scientists as they inspect the unique aquaeous flora and fauna.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Nicobar Islands: A Monkeys Long Tale
Nicobar Islands: A Monkeys Long Tale
Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: One of the most unique countries in the world is made up of over 7,600 islands, with more than 20 active volcanos. Besides that, the Philippines is covered in rich green forests, while its beaches are full of coral reefs. All this makes it one of the most bio-diverse places on the planet and a home to many wonderful and unusual species.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol Compilations
programme.desc: Theres not much that Dr. Jan Pol hasnt seen throughout his long, veterinarian career. The Dutch-born veterinarian has been helping animals since he graduated from Utrecht University in 1970. In this series we look back at memorable moments from his reality series, The Incredible Dr. Pol, where alongside his employees and his family he helps nurse a variety of creatures back to health from his Michigan-based practice. His clients come in all shapes and sizes, often needing urgent medical assistance, something that Dr. Jan Pol lives for. The passionate veterinarian is always keen to help, and we revisit the original series greatest moments.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: Animals survive by using camouflage, mimicry, and stealth tactics. From tigers who hunt in plain sight using their orange fur as camouflage, and a spider who mimics an ant to sneak into a colony, to a bird that uses false alarm calls to trick meerkats into giving up their prey, nature deploys remarkable deception to survive.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: Animals wage a covert war for survival, deploying their hidden weapons with deadly precision. These adaptations, forged by eons of evolution, give animals the edge they need to outwit predators, rivals, and the elements. From the bombardier beetles boiling spray to the mantis shrimps explosive club and the draco lizards hidden wings, meet natures awesome secret weapons.

programme.title: Chinas Wild Empire
programme.desc: The high mountain forests of Chinas Shennongjia National Park are home to golden snub-nosed monkeys. Told across a year, this film features two family clans battling it out for food, mates and social status. To survive and prosper they must endure extreme weather, food shortages, predator pressures and battles with rivals, in a society where its ultimately the females who hold big sway.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Heartland Docs
programme.desc: Reality series following husband and wife veterinarians Ben and Erin Schroeder as they tend to animals in rural Nebraska. In this picturesque corner of the midwestern state, doctors Ben and Erin do all they can to ensure the local animals get the attention and care they deserve. Braving fierce blizzards, treacherous tornados and scorching summers, the pair of veterinarians let nothing stop them from administering medical treatment to local livestock.

programme.title: NBA. Oklahomasitijas "Thunder" - Minesotas "Timberwolves"
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis grib iemācīt bērniem cept maizi, bet nekas nenotiek, kā plānots. Barbamazuļi iestāda avokado koku. Taču līdz ražai jāgaida vairāki gadi. Barbagudrajam ir ideja ietaupīt laiku.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.desc: Padingtonam jāizvēlas starp Angliju un Peru, pirms sākas futbola kausa mačs, taču viņš abas valstis mīl vienādi stipri. Pienācis brīdis tantei Lūsijai doties mājās, bet atlicis laiks vēl pēdējam piedzīvojumam. Vai tomēr ne?

programme.title: Barbapapa

programme.title: Barbapapa

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs šodien dodas uz trusītes Rebekas māju. Tā atšķiras no Pepas mājas. Tā ir kalnā, kurā kāpņu vietā ir tuneļi. Viņi spēlējas, un visi ir pārsteigti, kad Džordžs atklāj, ka viņam garšo burkāni.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs apciemo lielo māsīcu Hloju un viņas mazo brālīti Aleksandru. Mazulis Aleksandrs ir par mazu, lai spēlētos, bet Pepai un Hlojai ir lieliska ideja.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa kopā ar ģimeni dodas uz laukiem, lai pastaigātos pa mežu. Pepa un Džordžs atklāj putnu un skudru atstātās pēdas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Aita Sūzija izdomājusi draugu Lauvu Leo. Pepa neredz Leo, bet Sūzija saka, ka Leo patīk rēkt un pārģērbties. Pepa nolemj, ka tagad viņa redz Leo. Pat mamma un tētis tagad spēlē līdzi. Džordžs jūtas atstumts.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepai ir franču vēstuļu draudzene ēzelīte Delfīna. Viņas sarunājas arī pa telefonu. Kaut arī Pepa runā angliski, bet Delfīna - franciski, viņas atklāj, ka viņām ir daudz kopīga.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs palīdz vecvecākiem iztīrīt bēniņus, bet ir grūti izlemt, ko mest ārā. Starp vecajām mantām Pepa atrod atskaņotāju un senus ierakstus.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar draugiem dodas pārgājienā kopā ar Gazeles jaunkundzi. Kad satumst, viņi visi dzied pie ugunskura. Kad laiks iet gulēt, Pepa ar draugiem ir nobijušies, un visi bērni dodas gulēt Gazeles jaunkundzes teltī.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepas un Džordža rotaļlietu grozs ir pilns, un viņu gultas noklātas ar mantām. Mamma pasūta jaunu rotaļlietu plauktu, bet tas jāsaliek. Mammai un tētim tas nepadodas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepas ģimene uz dienu aizņemas no vectēva laivu. Tētis ir kapteinis, Pepa, Džordžs un mamma ir apkalpe. Kad laiva iestrēgst niedrēs, tētim jāizmanto viss spēks, lai to atbrīvotu.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras ģimene taisa pinjatu par godu māmiņas dzimšanas dienai, taču tā aizlido! Vai viņi to atradīs, pirms pārnāks māmiņa? Garnadzis nočiepj neredzamības segu un sāk čiept visu pēc kārtas. Dorai viņš jāaptur!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma atgriežas pie koka, zem kura piedzima. Tas ir sliktā stāvoklī. Viņiem tas steidzami jāglābj. Ir Barbamazuļu dzimšanas diena. Viņi katrs grib kaut ko citādu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni - Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals - suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss - suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi - katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu - sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts - Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: No Piedzīvojumu līča atbrauc Rokijs, lai apciemotu Rabla komandu. Tieši laikā, lai redzētu Celtnieklīča jauno lācēnu! Kad reindžere Roza lūdz palīdzēt ar celtniecību, Ātrmeistars netīšām iznīcina lāču māju. Ķepaiņiem un Rokijam jāglābj situācija.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Vecmamma rāda Dorai fotoalbumu ar putnu bildēm. Tomēr albumā vēl trūkst Fiksadū fotogrāfijas. Dora apņemas atrast un nofotografēt ašo putnu. Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz papagailēnam atgriezties mājās - taču ceļā putnēns nebeidz mēdīties!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni atrod dīvainu alu. Barbaliba stāsta par alām, un par to pārtapšanu. The Barbabērni nakšņo viesistabā. Bailēs no skapī mītošajiem briesmoņiem, viņi izliek ērmotus slazdus, lai noķertu tos.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais un Barbabo uzbūvē milzīgu koka rotaļlietu, ko darbina bio degviela.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mēre Greitveja un Dakija Dū kungs vēlas nodemonstrēt savas izpletņlēkšanas prasmes. Taču, kad patraucē vējš, suņi palīdz viņiem lēkt ar izpletni uz zemes! Kad Vīleram un cūkai Trifelei nesanāk slidot, komanda rod risinājumu uz riteņiem!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ceļot skeitparku, komanda sastopas ar problēmu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad komanda uzbūvē īpašu limonādes stendu Lūkasam un Lilija, īgnais Ātrmeistars ieripina to Celtnieklīča ielās. Kāpēc bebrs Krančijs šķērso ceļu? Jo Rabla komanda būvē tiltu, lai palīdzētu viņam nokļūt ceļa otrā pusē.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīci ir pārņēmis noslēpums. Kad pēkšņi pazūd pilsētnieku skulptūra, Rabla komandai pievienojas Čeiss, lai atrisinātu pazudušās statujas noslēpumu... un uzbūvētu gluži jaunu Zinātnes centru, lai palīdzētu izmeklēt.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz Benijam un vienraga dinozauram Uni atgūt pazaudēto burvju otu, lai Uni varētu atgriezties pie sava mīļdzīvnieka Zaķradža. Dora palīdz rumpulītei Hārtijai, lai viņa beidzot varētu piedalīties Rumpuļu spēlēs.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala un ģimenes dzīve! Barbagudrais un Barbabo uzbūvē milzīgu koka rotaļlietu, ko darbina bio degviela.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa

"Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi mēģina uzbūvēt lielu riteņu veikalu līdz Riteņu Festivālam... varbūt Ātrmeistars viņus apsteigs! Kad Motore atsakās iet vannā pirms ģimenes fotografēšanās, Rablam un suņiem jāatrod risinājums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad vējaina diena traucē būvēt saldējuma veikalu, Rabls, Miksa un Čārdžers ķeras pie darba. Rātsnamā kaut kas mistiski čīkst. Mērs Greitveja lūdz Rablam un Čārdžeram to atrast un salabot pirms viņas runas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Rabla komanda

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mērei Greitvejai vajag daudz picas, un ātri! Bet, kad pieslēdzas Ātrmeistars, suņiem jānovērš viņa picas problēma. Kad ģimene pa Ātrmeistara ceļu nevar pagūt uz lidostu, Rabla komandai līdz izlidošanai jāuzbūvē jauns ceļš.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Nē! Beigas! Barbabravo vairs nav mazulis, viņš ir liels puika!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni apņēmas sarīkot izcilu šovu! Barbaliba grib uztaisīt vislabāko limonādi.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un aitiņa Sūzija sastrīdas un nolemj, ka viņas vairs nav labākās draudzenes. Pēc kāda laika viņas sāk ilgoties viena pēc otras, bet atsakās izlīgt.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs spēlē dārzā bumbu, kad Sūzijas ierodas ar divām tenisa raketēm. Viņa izmanto bumbiņu, lai ar Pepu spēlētu tenisu, liekot Džordžam justies atstumtam. Vai bumbiņas pienesēja darbs viņu uzmundrinās?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Kādu dienu pēkšņi pazūd gaisma, un Pepas māja iegrimst tumsā. Noticis elektrības pārrāvums. Kamēr viņi gaida, kad elektrība atkal parādīsies, Pepa un Džordžs meklē lāpu un domā, kādas spēles spēlēt.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Šodien ir tēta dzimšanas diena, bet viņam jādodas uz darbu. Kamēr viņš ir prom, mamma, Pepa un Džordžs sagatavo īpašu pārsteigumu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa dodas uz zebras Zojas pidžamu ballīti kopā ar aitiņu Sūziju, trusīti Rebeku, kaķenīti Kendiju un zilonīti Emīliju. Meitenes spēlē spēles un izklaidējas. Beidzot viņām uznāk miegs. Viņas iekārtojas guļammaisos un aizmieg.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ir nakts, un debesīs redzamas zvaigznes. Mamma un tētis ļauj Pepai un Džordžam uzvilkt mēteļus un iziet ārā skatīties zvaigznes. Zvaigznes izskatās mazas, bet, kad Pepa un Džordžs skatās caur teleskopu, tās šķiet lielākas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Kad Pepa un Sūzija uzzina, ka pieaugušajiem visu dienu jāstrādā, viņas nolemj spēlēties veikalos. Drīz vien viņām tas apnīk.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa kopā ar ģimeni izbraucienā pamana varavīksni.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pedro ir lipīgs klepus, drīz vien saslimst arī pārējie bērni. Kad laiks doties, saslimst arī pieaugušie. Arī Gazeles jaunkundze. Dakteris Lācis iedod negaršīgas zāles, bet kas rūpēsies par viņu, kad viņš saslims?

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Isu apciemos Rāpuļu karaliene, bet dārzā valda nekārtība! Dora palīdz Isai gatavoties Karalienes vizītei. Dora iepazīstas ar sliņķi Semiju, kuram jāpagūst laikus nokļūt dienas nometnē, lai visus pārsteigtu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis grib iemācīt bērniem cept maizi, bet nekas nenotiek, kā plānots. Barbamazuļi iestāda avokado koku. Taču līdz ražai jāgaida vairāki gadi. Barbagudrajam ir ideja ietaupīt laiku.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pastaigas laikā Barbapapas atrod megalītu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni - Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals - suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss - suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi - katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu - sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts - Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Gatavojoties Banānu dienai, Gabrielam un Sjerrai Spīdošajai vajag būvnieku palīdzību, tāpēc Rabla komanda ķeras pie darba. Bākuguns vietā Ātrmeistars izgaismo debesis ar savu seju, kad tas nogādā kuģi nepatikšanās, ķepaiņi steidz palīdzēt.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Ātrmeistars nozog Rabla komandas autobusu, ķepaiņiem tas jāatgūst, lai paspētu uz Sjerras Spīdošās koncertu. Celtnieklīcī ir lieliska diena pludmalei! Rabla komandai jābūvē glābēju tornis, lai pludmalē būtu aboslūti droši.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērniem patīk nakts pasaciņas, bet ne tad, ja tās visu laiku atkārtojas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ātri jānomazgā Greitvejas dubļainais motocikls! Vīlers un suņi ķeras pie darba, lai uzbūvētu risinājumu pirms sacensībām. Vectēva Grants īpašā diena! Bet, kad nepieciešama suņu palīdzība, viņiem jāmaina vectēva dienas plāni.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ceļot skeitparku, komanda sastopas ar problēmu. Komanda palīdz popzvaigznei nogādāt savu autobusu pilsētā.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda. Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas. Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Lielais Sarkanais Cālis nejauši sarucina Doru un Zābaciņu, tāpēc Doras brālītim un māsiņai jāpalīdz viņiem atkal kļūt lieliem. Dora glābj draugus no Benija gaisa balona, lai visi varētu doties uz svinībām Karalienes pilī.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda. Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas. Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Ātrmeistars uzbūvējis nedrošu rotaļlaukumu, Rabla komandai jādomā radoši un jāuzbūvē jauns laukums no veciem materiāliem. Pilsētas Čili Kūkarū ir apdraudēts, kad sāk iebrukt Rātsnama jumts! Par laimi suņi zina, kā to salabot.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mēre Greitveja un Dakija Dū kungs vēlas nodemonstrēt savas izpletņlēkšanas prasmes. Taču, kad patraucē vējš, suņi palīdz viņiem lēkt ar izpletni uz zemes! Kad Vīleram un cūkai Trifelei nesanāk slidot, komanda rod risinājumu uz riteņiem!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi atrod vectēva Grants laimīgi boulinga bumbu. Diemžēl Celtnieklīcī nav boulinga zāles... līdz šim! Kad pēkšņa superziedēšana sagūsta Motori, Liliju un Parka Reindžeri Rozu, suņiem jārod ziediem draudzīgs risinājums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pirmoreiz bērni brauks ar vilcienu un pavadīs nakti viesnīcā. Barbabo rada lielisku sniegavīru.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis stāsta bērniem par piedzīvojumu ar vilku. Rīt būs barbabērnu pirmā skolas diena.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma atgriežas pie koka, zem kura piedzima. Tas ir sliktā stāvoklī. Viņiem tas steidzami jāglābj. Ir Barbamazuļu dzimšanas diena. Viņi katrs grib kaut ko citādu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pastaigas laikā Barbapapas atrod megalītu.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Winn, and Jasmine go to Patty Possums Party Playground, an entertainment fun zone for kids. Hazel wishes the animatronic Patty Possum would come to life. Patty joins the friends for the night and even brings them up to perform on stage! But at closing time, Patty doesnt want to lose her new friends, so she locks them inside the Party Playground. Cosmo and Wandas wands are stuck in the claw machine, so they cant help! They will have to evade this unhinged mascot without magic and find a way out. // Wanting Angela and Marcus to have a romantic anniversary, Hazel wishes that they would "fall in love all over again." When the wish causes her parents to forget each other, Hazel calls on Cupid to make them fall back in love. Upset that Hazel undid his work, Cupid challenges her to a competition in which Hazel and Marcus must compete with Cupid and Angelas old flame, Brewster, for Angelas affection. Can she beat Cupid at his own game and get her parents to fall back in love?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its Kindness Day! Mr. Guzman announces that if all students complete one act of kindness, theyll get a class pizza party-and Hazel wants that pizza! But when Dev refuses to participate, Cosmo and Wanda call on the Pe-Az, a trio of alien diplomats, to reason with him. Despite their best efforts, Dev outsmarts the Pe-Az and uses their alien technology to get rid of all the pizza on Earth.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Its Christmas and tradition dictates that there should be 13 desserts on the table. But Chef has got his quantities wrong and hes only made 12! Chef and Blossom head into the forest to find the ingredients to make the missing dessert. They run into Gargamel who is picking the last walnuts of the season to prepare a meal for his family. He wants to impress his mother! Theres only one solution: to follow him. But Gargamels mother turns up with Dwayne and Rowena. The Smurfs offer to help Gargamel to finish his menu. They hope to create a diversion and steal his dessert. // Its Jokeys turn to look after Baby Smurf. Brainy accuses him of being a bad babysitter so Bubble offers to help him but then things get tricky: Baby Smurf is somehow turned into a snail! Brainy is threatening to tell Papa Smurf everything, so Jokey and Bubble need to find a way of turning Baby Smurf back into Baby Smurf. Quick! But more disasters lie ahead.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Clumsy and Dimwitty cause an accident when they argue once again about who is going to drive the fire truck. They dont want to be told off by Papa Smurf so they decide to get rid of it. But when a fire starts in the village, Papa Smurf orders them to go and get it. They do all they can to get it back but it wont be easy! They bump into the ogre and Begonia before heading to Gargamels. // Gargamel sets a new trap for the Smurfs by bewitching pebbles. The Smurfs are so enchanted by these shiny wonders that they argue endlessly about their incredible beauty. Luckily Voltaire is on the lookout and isnt hypnotized! He frees Lily from the magic spell and together they save their friends.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Bubble and Firefly are on the lookout for an amazing adventure, so they head to Gargamels hovel. Once there, they see that Dwayne and Rowena are spending the night at their uncles. Rowena is desperate for the tooth fairy to come and get her baby tooth thats hanging on by a thread! This gives Bubble an idea: theyre going to steal Rowenas tooth and take it back to the village to prove that theyre also adventurers. // When Gargamel finds a way of turning off all the lights thanks to a magic switch, the Smurfs are plunged into complete darkness. Only Firefly can help them to see in the dark ... but that attracts Gargamel to the village. He catches all of the Smurfs, except for Firefly, who will have to be very brave to free her friends. This gives her a great confidence boost!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: In this ad-packed variety episode, The Patrick Show sells merchandise in order to fund its second season. // Patrick forces his entire family to participate in a series of different game show challenges.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie for his latest scheme in Spin the Bottle, then in Theres a Sponge in My Soup, Mr. Krabs new Krabby soup is a hit - until some heat-loving hippies move in. 21:00 Kamp Koral Join SpongeBob and his pals as they spend the summer building underwater campfires, catching wild jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck at the craziest camp in the kelp forest, Kamp Koral! (Subtitled)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Raphs strength wont save him when hes caught between the Mechazoids and the notorious street gang known as Purple Dragons! Week to week, they have tiny problems that always get out of hand. programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Dev is bummed at his own birthday party because his dad is off working. Hazel tries to cheer him up by wishing for a pair of rocket boots for him. He is stoked! Then, a party princess arrives, but this is no ordinary party princess, its VICKY from the original series. Meanwhile, Cosmo, Wanda, and Peri stumble into a secret room, where they discover that Dale has been investigating Hazel since Founders Day. Back at the party, Vicky, rotten as ever, forces the kids to make crafts for her online store instead of having fun. Hazel comes up with a plan full of zany traps to stop Vicky and take the party back! When Dev discovers his dad has been researching Hazel instead of spending time with him, Dev lashes out at Hazel and wishes Peri away. Left alone with his anger, is there a devious plan hatching in Devs mind?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Having filled up another wish card, Hazel is enjoying a fun, fantasy wish. Meanwhile, Cookie, the fairy who got bested by Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda after their Wish Trials, is setting a trap for our trio. She tricks them into publicly talking about magic at a fake museum exhibit, records the evidence, and then takes them to Fairy Court. Now, Hazel must prove that Cosmo and Wanda are innocent, or else lose them forever. // Frustrated by her moms split attention between work and home, Hazel wishes to be her assistant to spend more time with her. Cosmo and Wanda turn Hazel into an adult, and she spends the day struggling to fulfill her duties. Even though being a working adult is hard, Hazel is excited to be spending so much quality time with Angela. But when the puppet standing in for Hazel at school gets called into the nurses office, Angela rushes off to take care of it and Hazel must give the presentation instead!

Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur. Cosmo and Wanda bring Bary, a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period, to present day. Hazel makes wishes to find Bary a job but unfortunately, Bary never quite fits in. Worse, his giant dinosaur tail knocks out power to the whole city, ruining Dimmadelphias prized Electric Light Ice Cream Float Parade. With Hazel feeling remorseful, Bary musters inspiration from his hero, the great Thomas Rex-ison, and uses his dinosaur smarts to try to save the day. // Hazel has planned a night of watching scary movies with her new friend, Jasmine, but it turns out Jasmine hates scary movies. Rather than change the plan, Hazel wishes Jasmine had no fears. When Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, the fears escape Jasmines mind, coming into the real world. Hazel tries fighting the fears off but learns its Jasmine who must face them to make them disappear. Now, shes got to talk her new friend into doing everything shes most afraid of, which gets the attention of Fear Itself!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials in Fairy World to prove theyre a match. Hazel crumbles under pressure, struggling to make a wish confidently, which leads to Cosmo and Wanda failing to grant her half-formed wishes. Consequently, Jorgen reassigns Hazel to a boisterous, no-nonsense fairy named Cookie, who only cares about efficiency, not accuracy. Displeased with the cookie-cutter nature of Cookies magic, Hazel must find a way to confidently wish for Cosmo and Wanda to be her fairies again. // Intimidated by her new classmates, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead. Once her wish is granted, she and the teachers play around the schoolyard and neglect to prep for the big test coming up. When test day arrives, Hazel realizes her wish has decreased the teachers maturity. Theyre acting like little kids! Hazel has to make a choice-keep her teacher friends and let the whole school fail or change them back and brave making new friends the hard way.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: GrandPat prevents his precious memories from being sold at a family yard sale. ) 08:31 SpongeBob SquarePants The biggest mystery 20,000 leagues beneath the sea is uncovered when SpongeBob and the gang find the lost city of Atlantis, in this special SpongeBob TV movie! Guest starring David Bowie. (Subtitled)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to be 13 so that she can go see a PG-13 movie by herself, Cosmo and Wanda turn her into a teenager. They go the mall and have a blast doing "teenage things" while they wait for the movie. But, as a side effect of her wish, Hazel starts going through the fairy version of puberty: pasta puberty! As she struggles to deal with pesto pimples and mozzarella mood swings, Hazel wishes that Cosmo and Wanda would just get lost! They disappear, leaving Hazel to deal with the zany pasta puberty alone. // Hazel wishes to be a fairy to join Cosmo and Wanda at their Fairy Convention, but since its against Da Rules, she settles on looking like a fairy instead. Once at the con, however, Hazel stumbles into the DMV booth and signs a "Fairy-fication" certificate, turning her into a real fairy! It also brings her anti-fairy into existence, who steals the certificate. Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must get the certificate back from her anti-fairy, or Hazel will be stuck as a fairy forever!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel must take matters into her own hands to get to the bottom of Devs surly attitude and save pizza! When Hazel makes a wish to understand why Dev acts the way he does, she gets paired with him for a class scavenger hunt. They struggle to work together, but, as the day goes on, they develop a friendship. However, that falls apart when Devs dad, Dale, belittles their effort, causing Dev to turn on Hazel again to save face. Will Dev be able to overcome his pride and finish the project, or will his issues with his dad tank both their grades?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Gargamel tries to teach Dwayne to catch the Smurfs. As an incentive, he offers him a deal: hell get him a new Snap if he catches a Smurf. Suddenly Dwayne is all in! He prepares a potion that will turn him into a super tracker. What he hadnt expected was the potion turning him into a hunting dog. After several unsuccessful but funny attempts, he finds his way to the Smurf village. Oh no! Who can get him off the trail? // Meteorite is tireless: shes always tapping the beat on whatever she has at hand. When shes drumming in the forest, she and Storm run into Gargamel. They manage to escape but she forgets her drum. Gargamel makes the most of this and bewitches it so that it comes to life. Its music hypnotizes the Smurfies and leads them straight to Gargamel. Meteorite uses his own weapon against him in an unexpected way!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Life is more fun when youre dancing! Thats what Meteorite is thinking whilst Brainy is trying to get everyone to work so that the village is clean when Papa Smurf returns. When Meteorite finds a night club in the forest, she brings it back to the village with help from Vanity. The discosmurf encounters a huge success - all of the Smurfs and Smurfies are dancing ... but beware, it might be one of Gargamels traps. // Everyone is preparing a dance party and Diaper Daddy is delighted to be going. But his battery is nearly empty so Handy puts him in standby mode to recharge him. When he wakes up, hes devastated to learn that hes missed the party! Annoyed, he heads off into the forest looking for a new family. The first person he bumps into is Dwayne, who adopts him as his new toy, with Rowena looking on with envy. Handy will do everything he can to get his friend back.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Lily and Chef are preparing a picnic when theyre attacked by Azrael. They throw the delicious muffins that theyd made for the party at him. But Azrael doesnt like cakes and this annoys Chef. So he decides to make the most delicious cat food for him. Azrael eats the cat food and it makes him as cuddly and cute as a kitten. This gives Gargamel an idea: hes going to give this magic cat food to his mother. She also becomes as gentle as a kitten ... but not for long! // Lily makes waffles that are so delicious that even Dwayne cant get enough of them! To escape from him, Lily and Greedy run away with the waffle truck, trying to lose him. He catches up with them and eats all of Greedys waffles. But thats still not enough, Dwayne wants even more waffles. What he doesnt know is that Voltaire has got his eye on him and knows how to defend Lily.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: When Max and Phoebe are due to attend Parent-Teacher night at school, Chloe asks to have her friends over to the house unsupervised. Despite being told no, she secretly invites Jinx and Booch over while her guardians are out. At school, Max convinces a reluctant Phoebe to lead an art demonstration for the parents, under the watchful eye of the schools vindictive superintendent. Meanwhile, Jinx discovers the Air Lair, and before Chloe can offer a good cover story, he assumes evil spies are secretly living at their home, and plan to target the parents at the school that night. Jinx races to the school to stop his imagined threat, disrupting Phoebes demonstration and putting the Thundermans cover jobs in jeopardy.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: On a fairy family trip to Fairy World, Dev convinces Hazel to steal Peris wand and explore Fairy World. Cosmo, Wanda and Peri sneak into Jorgens office and use his tracker to find them. Hazel and Dev end up stuck in the Un-Wish Zone, trapped by the Un-wish Dragon. Together they must battle the dragon and find their way back to their fairies before Jorgen finds out! // When band and orchestra tryouts happen at school, Hazel finds herself stuck in the middle of a rivalry between the two. Rather than choose a side, she wishes to be good at all instruments and ends up in both. Exhausted from the double life shes living, she wishes that the band and orchestra had nothing to be rivals about. In granting the wish, Cosmo and Wanda get rid of all music on Earth. Hazel, with the help of the Nmusic Phairy (silent N), must restore music to Earth and end this rivalry once and for all!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: During a visit from Antony, Hazels wish lands them inside "Rattleconda Racers," a board game they invented. Once in the game, however, they bicker about the best way to play. Hazel wants to stick to the rules they used to play by, but Antony wants to make new ones. When the formidable Rhonda the Rattleconda takes off with Cosmo and Wanda, intending to make them her next meal, Hazel and Antony must confront the tension in their relationship to save them and escape the game! // When Hazel must give a presentation on what she wants to be when she grows up, she is excited to share her dreams of being a geologist! Wanting to wow her classmates, she wishes she could excavate an "out of this world" rock to show them. Cosmo and Wanda poof her underground to find a super special rock, and she does! But in the process, she angers a group of rock monsters and must use her knowledge of geology to win them over, get her rock back, and escape the cave!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Jack and Lily are half-siblings living on opposite ends of the world both hoping to have the "best summer ever." When dangerous events forces Jacks mom to send him to live with his dad, the kids fear their summer dreams have become a nightmare.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: 10-year-old Hazel Wells has just moved to Dimmadelphia with her family and is struggling with the change. On top of that, her beloved brother, Antony, is away at his first year of college and Hazel is feeling lonely without him. When she has a rocky start at her new school and Antony has to cancel a visit, Hazel tries to run away to visit Antony.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: When Max and Phoebe are due to attend Parent-Teacher night at school, Chloe asks to have her friends over to the house unsupervised. Despite being told no, she secretly invites Jinx and Booch over while her guardians are out. At school, Max convinces a reluctant Phoebe to lead an art demonstration for the parents, under the watchful eye of the schools vindictive superintendent. Meanwhile, Jinx discovers the Air Lair, and before Chloe can offer a good cover story, he assumes evil spies are secretly living at their home, and plan to target the parents at the school that night. Jinx races to the school to stop his imagined threat, disrupting Phoebes demonstration and putting the Thundermans cover jobs in jeopardy.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials in Fairy World to prove theyre a match. Hazel crumbles under pressure, struggling to make a wish confidently, which leads to Cosmo and Wanda failing to grant her half-formed wishes. Consequently, Jorgen reassigns Hazel to a boisterous, no-nonsense fairy named Cookie, who only cares about efficiency, not accuracy. Displeased with the cookie-cutter nature of Cookies magic, Hazel must find a way to confidently wish for Cosmo and Wanda to be her fairies again. // Intimidated by her new classmates, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead. Once her wish is granted, she and the teachers play around the schoolyard and neglect to prep for the big test coming up. When test day arrives, Hazel realizes her wish has decreased the teachers maturity. Theyre acting like little kids! Hazel has to make a choice-keep her teacher friends and let the whole school fail or change them back and brave making new friends the hard way.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Jasmine, and Winn take an online BFF compatibility test. To their surprise, they fail! Nobody is fazed, except for Hazel, who overthinks the results and wishes that her friends could know exactly whats in her head. Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, which lands all of them inside Hazels mind. As they go through her mind like a museum, Hazel continues to overthink everything they see. Now, Hazel must overcome her negative thoughts and battle a literal mind worm to get her friends out! // When Hazel wishes she didnt have a gap in her teeth, the Tooth Fairy fills her gap with a talking tooth, Toothica. At first, she seems like a lot of fun, but when Toothica gets Hazel in trouble with her parents and plans a party in Hazels mouth Hazel isnt invited to, Hazel decides she wants her gone! The Tooth Fairy, however, takes Toothicas side and is even set on honoring her at a gala. Hazel must find a way to prove Toothica is no good and get back her gap or be stuck with this rotten tooth forever.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj
programme.desc: Its a snow day! Sammy and Raj are ready to race their sleighs but when they get to the mount, Tara has already set up camp.// Sammy, Raj and Dadi are a musical sensation! But after entering a local talent on show, Raj becomes really nervous.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: King Me/Private and the Winky Factory King Me: King Juliens archrival, Clemson, returns in another attempt to claim the lemur crown. This time the sneaky lemur has a document that "proves" King Julien is not the legitimate king because he wasnt born in Madagascar. A series of challenges to prove whos more kingly ensues, and the penguins try to stack the deck in Juliens favor by each switching brains with him. Simple, right? How could a plan like this possibly fail? Private and the Winky Factory: Privates favorite treat, the Peanut Butter Winky, is going the way of the dinosaur. Distraught that the snack cake is ceasing production, Private urges a raid on the Winky Factory where the last remaining Winkies are rolling off the production line. Impressed by Privates passion, Skipper gives him command of the mission! The young penguin learns theres a heck of a lot to digest when leading a team. programme.desc: Best and Bester get too carried away when tasked with commercializing Bettervales most beguiling natural wonder. // Diamondo is used to getting everything he wants, and decides what he wants is a sibling, just like Best and Bester.
